At <strong>Invertor Lux</strong>, we bel: At Invertor Lux, we believe that comfort is more than a luxury — it’s a necessity. Established in 2024 and headquartered in Chișinău, Moldova, we have rapidly grown into a trusted name in air conditioning sales and professional installation services, proudly serving residential homes, businesses, and institutions throughout the country.
With a customer-first philosophy and a t: With a customer-first philosophy and a team of experienced HVAC professionals, we don’t just sell products — we create tailored climate control experiences that enhance everyday living and working environments.
<strong>Invertor Lux</strong> was founde: Invertor Lux was founded with a simple goal: to bring modern, energy-efficient climate solutions to every corner of Moldova. Whether it’s a small apartment, a large office space, or a commercial facility, we design and deliver cooling systems that meet your exact needs — no compromises.
We are more than a supplier — we are a c: We are more than a supplier — we are a complete service partner. From personalized consultation and expert installation to post-sale support, we are with you every step of the way.
To deliver high-quality, reliable, and a: To deliver high-quality, reliable, and affordable air conditioning systems along with expert installation services that prioritize customer comfort, energy savings, and long-term performance.
To be recognized as Moldova’s most respe: To be recognized as Moldova’s most respected and forward-thinking climate solutions company — where every household and business can rely on us for dependable indoor comfort and peace of mind.
We bring technical expertise and attenti: We bring technical expertise and attention to detail to every installation, ensuring it’s done right the first time.
We build long-term relationships based o: We build long-term relationships based on honesty, transparency, and reliability. No hidden fees. No false promises.
We offer the latest Inverter and energy-: We offer the latest Inverter and energy-efficient technologies to help customers save on costs and reduce their environmental impact.
We listen carefully, respond quickly, an: We listen carefully, respond quickly, and always put our customers’ needs at the heart of what we do.
We proudly serve clients across all of M: We proudly serve clients across all of Moldova, regardless of your location or project size.
Whether you're cooling a cozy home, outf: Whether you're cooling a cozy home, outfitting a new office, or retrofitting a large commercial site, Invertor Lux delivers:
<strong>Top-brand air conditioning units: Top-brand air conditioning units from trusted global manufacturers
